item.title: The CFPB drops its case against payment app Zelle, in another sign of a Trump pivot
item.description: It's the latest lawsuit abandoned by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau since Trump appointees have taken over at the bureau.

item.title: American businesses reel as Trump tariffs start to bite
item.description: Business owners across the country worry they will also suffer the impact from President Trump's tariffs on imports from Mexico, Canada and China.

item.title: Vance's comments about European peacekeeping plan for Ukraine draw ire abroad
item.description: Vice President Vance said the best security guarantee for Ukraine is to sign a mineral deal with the United States.

item.title: U.S. stock markets plunge as Trump's tariffs spark fears about a trade war
item.description: U.S. stock markets plummeted on Tuesday morning as a new global trade war began.

item.title: Canada and China say the fentanyl crisis is only a 'pretext' for Trump's new tariffs
item.description: Canadian and Chinese officials say they were already helping reduce fentanyl smuggling. Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said fentanyl crossing the north...
